Detailed Description

Represents a BubbleText widget.

You can add number to this bubble.

The following example demonstrates how to use the BubbleTextWidget

 LinearController*    mpCtrl = new LinearController(this);
 BubbleText1 = new BubbleTextWidget(this,  9);
 BubbleText2 = new BubbleTextWidget(this, 99);
 BubbleText3 = new BubbleTextWidget(this,100);
 ControllerParams*    mpCp_WW = new ControllerParams(ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT,
                                                      ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT);
 LinearController* Bubblecontrol = new LinearController(this);
 Bubblecontrol->setOrientation(LinearController::HORIZONTAL);
 Bubblecontrol->addWidget(BubbleText1,mpCp_WW);
 Bubblecontrol->addWidget(BubbleText2,mpCp_WW);
 Bubblecontrol->addWidget(BubbleText3,mpCp_WW);
 mpCtrl->addWidget(Bubblecontrol);
 mScene->attachController(mpCtrl);
 mScene->setupSceneLayout();
